attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All convicted terrorists guilty of crimes against Britain should be jailed and then deported.

To quote the Primeminister :-
'Convicted terrorists will have to provide police with details of their whereabouts after release and will be banned from foreign travel.'

We say trying to monitor their movements is pointless, kick them out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
